Package it.polimi.ingsw.Controller

Class Context

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Context
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer<Choice>
public class Context
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer<Choice>
The Context contains the logic of the game. it controls the turn flow according to the choices of the players and the current model. It contains some boolean variables used to apply god effects and an ArrayList used by Artemis and Demeter to save the old player positions

      Returns a State constructed following the rules for every active move-affecting god
      Parameters:
      firstAction - used when the move is the first action performed in the turn

      private java.util.ArrayList<Box> apolloEffect​(java.util.ArrayList<Box> basicMoves, Box b)
      Parameters:
      basicMoves - basic list of move boxes (without god effects applied)
      b - box where the player's worker is at
      Returns:
      list of possible move boxes including Apollo special effect moves
